sentence.Network_en: The choice will be between a flat-rate or a banded charge.
sentence.Network_cn: 将在统一费用和分级费用之间作出选择。

sentence.Network_en: Tables are set with white china and gold-banded silver cutlery.
sentence.Network_cn: 桌上摆放着白色瓷器和镶着金边的银制餐具。

sentence.Network_en: They banded together in their own small communities.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在各自的小社区中抱成一团。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 地质专业英语词汇_百度文库 ... band 带;夹层 banded 带状的 banded coal 条带状煤.
“带状(banded)”指的是每个报表都有多个水平区域组成，每个区域就是一个“带(band)”。比如，报表头，页眉，页脚，中间的明细数据 …
the petrological study shows that banded ore belongs to mylonite , which has abundant microstructure feature of plastic deformation .岩石学研究表明条带状矿石属于糜棱岩，具有丰富的塑性变形显微构造特征。

entry.def: If something is banded, it has one or more bands on it, often of a different colour which contrasts with the main colour.

example.ex: ...a stark tower, banded in dark and light stone.
example.tran: 有深色和浅色石头条纹的荒凉塔楼

means.word_mean: 1. identified with a band especially around a leg;

sentences.sentence: "kept watch for the return of their banded birds"

means.word_mean: 2. marked with bands or strips of contrasting color or texture;
3. characterized by a band of especially white around the body;
